sn1.76:1: "Kiṁ jīrati kiṁ na jīrati,kiṁsu uppathoti vuccati;Kiṁsu dhammānaṁ paripantho,kiṁsu rattindivakkhayo;Kiṁ malaṁ brahmacariyassa,kiṁ sinānamanodakaṁ.
sn1.76:2: Kati lokasmiṁ chiddāni,yattha vittaṁ na tiṭṭhati;Bhagavantaṁ puṭṭhumāgamma,kathaṁ jānemu taṁ mayan"ti.
sn1.76:3: "Rūpaṁ jīrati maccānaṁ,nāmagottaṁ na jīrati;Rāgo uppathoti vuccati.
sn1.76:4: Lobho dhammānaṁ paripantho,Vayo rattindivakkhayo;Itthī malaṁ brahmacariyassa,Etthāyaṁ sajjate pajā;Tapo ca brahmacariyañca,Taṁ sinānamanodakaṁ.
sn1.76:5: Cha lokasmiṁ chiddāni,yattha vittaṁ na tiṭṭhati;Ālasyañca pamādo ca,anuṭṭhānaṁ asaṁyamo;Niddā tandī ca te chidde,sabbaso taṁ vivajjaye"ti.
